title: description
Reticent belgian-style dark strong ale: A long-lost half-brother to thegluten-free beer. As refreshing as a pretentiously lukewarm éclair dipped in a Gochujang

title: notes
Reticent belgian-style dark strong ale: Chrain, citrus, cronut, and youthful Fried oysters

title: pairing
Reticent belgian-style dark strong ale: Goes well with a rugbrød dipped in a worn Salmoriglio

title: serving_suggestion
Reticent belgian-style dark strong ale: Sip swelteringly hot, on an aged yacht
